title: How comes those big bulky guys barely hurt but a small chick can throw a spear at you for 50% hp?
body:
No seriously.

You would think a single uppercut from someone like Darius or Braum would be enough to KO someone like Annie. 

Let alone Sion.

Yet they barely hurt when they swing his Axe.

But then some random archer who barely has enough strenght to use her bow properly shoots an arrow at you through your armor and it hurts like fuck?

And somehow Teemo shoots you with his tiny Zarabatana and it blinds you? 

How the fuck does that make sense?

You would think the bulkiest guys would be the ones who hurt the hardest.
